info.name: Wintry Dashboard Theme
info.description: Clean, simple dash theme with easily customizable background.
info.additionalInfo:
Additional instructions: http://eatsleeptv.tumblr.com/post/68915462175

Please report any bugs to my Tumblr ask or below and I'll try my best to fix it.
